short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat history local saving and search, as well as voice chat capabilities

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly Index Your Past Conversations:
With just one click, ChatGPT Keeper allows you to index all your past conversations, providing easy access in one central location. This efficient process ensures you can quickly find any piece of information.

Advanced Search with Scoring and Filters:
Equipped with a powerful search engine, ChatGPT Keeper utilizes scoring to prioritize results, whether you're looking for an exact, partial, or close match. Enhance your search with options to filter by date range and even specific images, tailoring results to your needs.

Categorize Messages for Streamlined Organization:
You can categorize your messages to better organize your conversations, making it simpler to navigate and retrieve relevant chats.

Bookmark and Retrieve Important Conversations:
Easily bookmark essential messages and search within your bookmarks for quick retrieval, keeping crucial information at your fingertips.

Full Control Over Your Data:
Your conversation data is stored locally and is fully controlled by you. Delete or manage your data at any time with ease, ensuring complete privacy and ownership.

Effortless Data Portability:
ChatGPT Keeper supports data export and import, allowing you to share your conversation history with others or transfer it to another device without hassle.

Designed for Large Data Volumes:
Whether managing hundreds or thousands of messages, ChatGPT Keeper handles large data sizes efficiently, so space constraints are never an issue.

Voice Recognition for Hands-Free Control:
Utilize voice recognition capabilities to search and manage your conversations hands-free, adding convenience to your chat management experience.

In Conclusion:
ChatGPT Keeper is your essential tool for managing past conversations. With its robust search capabilities, easy categorization, and comprehensive control features, it's an indispensable extension for anyone looking to optimize their conversation management.
